---
title: "Deep Learning"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- list.files("output") %>% 
  map(~ file.path(getwd(), 'output', .)) %>% 
  map(read_csv) %>% 
  map(function(d) d %>% mutate(runid = as.character(runid))) %>% 
  reduce(bind_rows)

df %>% View()
```

```{r}
agg <- df %>% 
  group_by(dataset, n_train_img, n_orig_img) %>% 
  summarise(acc = last(acc), val_acc = last(val_acc))

ggplot() + 
  geom_point(data=agg, aes(n_orig_img, acc)) + 
  facet_grid(n_train_img ~ .)
```


```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_line(data=df, aes(epoch, acc, group=runid), colour="steelblue") + 
  facet_grid(dataset + n_train_img ~ n_orig_img) + 
  ylim(0.7, NA)
```
